H0.text: The pilgrim route to Santiago de Compostela in Northern Spain is known as the ‘Way’ of which saint. St Peter

H1.text: The pilgrim route to Santiago de Compostela in Northern Spain is known as the ‘Way’ of which saint. St Christopher

H2.text: The pilgrim route to Santiago de Compostela in Northern Spain is known as the ‘Way’ of which saint. St Sebastian

H3.text: The pilgrim route to Santiago de Compostela in Northern Spain is known as the ‘Way’ of which saint. St James

A4.text: The Camino de Santiago is known as the Way of St. James in English.

A5.text: Legend holds that St James's remains were carried by boat from Jerusalem to northern Spain.
